title: The Pinnacle Luxury Living Downtown Union Station
neighborhood: Downtown Union Station LoDo LoHi Highlands RiNo Riverfront
posting_body: ['Residence 510 is a contemporary 1,272 sqft one bedroom, one den, and one-and-a-half bath unit with elegant Ash hardwood floors.', 'A unique feature in the building, the floors in this unit are stained a rich ebony for added drama.', 'From your 318-square-foot private terrace you can enjoy the natural gas hookups that allow for easy outdoor entertaining using a full-sized barbecue grill.', 'The lower level includes living and dining areas as well as a powder room and an expansive in-unit storage closet under the staircase.', 'The primary suite on the upper level includes a spacious closet and ensuite bathroom with a double sink vanity, enticing soaking tub, and wall-to-wall Carrera marble.', 'The den space off the bedroom, separated by pocket doors will lend itself well to a home office or media room.', 'Monthly rent $4,800.', 'Call, Text,', 'show contact info', 'or Email Gene for fast showings', '*Restrictions may apply.', 'Pricing, availability, and lease terms are subject to change without notice.']
